name: planter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who grows a particular crop in a hot part of the world: a tea/rubber planter
a large container in which plants are grown for decoration
Steven Morris Photography/Photolibrary/GettyImages
a machine used to plant crops: a potato planter

planter noun [C]
(LIVING THING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large container in which esp. decorative plants are grown: The sidewalk is lined with planters overflowing with flowers.
A planter is also someone who owns a plantation (= large farm in a hot part of the world).
